topic.title: What's new in Release 13.1
topic.p: Please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 13.1.

section.title: Updates to the Mingle API
section.p: In our 13.1 release, the Mingle API has been extended to include the ability to:

bullets.item: Get, update, create and delete objectives in your program plan. Read more about the Objective API.
Access objective-related events in your program plan. Read more about the Plan objective events API.
Track when a card was copied from a source project to a destination project. Read more about card events in our events API and copying a card.

section.title: Update to supported browsers
section.p: We have added official support for Chrome in Mingle 13.1. Read more about other supported browsers in system requirements.

section.title: Update to MQL
section.p: We have added the official support for ORDER BY card rank in table query. Read more about card ranking and table query.

section.title: Bug Fixes
section.p: The following bugs have been fixed with 13.1:

bullets.item: Rails security fixes: Mingle uses Rails as its web application framework. This release of Mingle includes fixes for two urgent security vulnerabilities found in the Rails framework. For more information on these vulnerabilities see: VU#628463 and CVE-2013-0156.
Macro parameter parsing can execute Ruby code
Formula parsing fails for special characters
Cannot remove card type from tree
Card edit shows 500 error on change in card type associated with tree
Git source integration stops working after one error
Unable to print cards from list view
Printing a card includes unwanted links
